questions.question: 3.  Glucose oxidase reagent is a mixture of

answers.a: Glucose oxidase, glucose and ortho - toludine
answers.b: Glucose oxidase, ortho - toluidine and hydrogen peroxide
answers.c: Glucose oxidase, ortho - toluidine and peroxidase
answers.d: Glucose oxidase, glucose  and hydrogen peroxide

questions.question: 4.  Blood is collected in EDTA bottle because

answers.c: To increase the density of blood
answers.d: To avoid reaction with other chemicals
